title: Web3 Foundation Grant Distribution
description:
# Web3 Infrastructure Development Grant

## Total Grant: 100,000 DAI

## Recipients and Deliverables

### 0xGrantee1 (40% - 40,000 DAI)
**Core Protocol Development**
- Layer 2 scaling implementation
- Cross-chain bridge protocols
- Performance optimization
- **Milestones**:
  1. Architecture design (10,000 DAI)
  2. Implementation (20,000 DAI)
  3. Testing & Integration (10,000 DAI)

### 0xGrantee2 (35% - 35,000 DAI)
**Security & Auditing**
- Smart contract security audit
- Penetration testing
- Vulnerability assessment
- **Milestones**:
  1. Initial audit (15,000 DAI)
  2. Fix verification (10,000 DAI)
  3. Final security report (10,000 DAI)

### 0xGrantee3 (25% - 25,000 DAI)
**Documentation & Tools**
- Technical documentation
- API specifications
- Developer tooling
- **Milestones**:
  1. Documentation framework (10,000 DAI)
  2. Tool development (10,000 DAI)
  3. Community resources (5,000 DAI)

## Release Requirements
1. Monthly progress reports
2. Public repository contributions
3. Community feedback integration
4. Milestone demonstration calls
